title: Melania Trump’s Next Act Is Selling NFTs
sub_head: Former first lady will sell ‘Melania’s Vision,’ the latest public figure to get into digital collectibles
body:
Former first lady Melania Trump is joining the NFT craze.
Mrs. Trump said Thursday that she is selling an NFT, or nonfungible token, of a digital watercolor painting of her eyes. It’s called “Melania’s Vision” and plays an audio recording of Mrs. Trump saying: “My vision is, look forward with inspiration, strength and courage.”
